"Dash Panels": "Press <%Access> to access the dash panels. This will allow you to dash for a limited time."

"While dashing, every time you jump through another dash panel ring, you can dash for longer periods of time. (Re-accessing the dash panels won't be necessary if you jump through the dash panel rings.ï¼‰

(Performable actions while dashing)
Press <%Jump> to jump.
Press <%NormalAttack>/<%PhotonArts> to kick.

The attack power of your kick can be enhanced up to a maximum of 3 stages by jumping through more dash panel rings.

By skillfully jumping through the dash panel rings, you can quickly reach the destination, and reach the fight immediately."
